sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.TRX_CD ,A.TRX_RSN_CD ,A.COA_CMPY_CD ,A.COA_BR_CD ,A.COA_CC_CD ,A.COA_ACCT_CD ,A.COA_PROD_CD ,A.COA_CH_CD ,A.COA_AFFL_CD ,A.COA_PROJ_CD ,A.COA_EXTN_CD ,A.JRNL_DEAL_AMT ,A.SLS_REP_CR_PCT ,A.SER_NUM ,A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,A.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.DS_CONTR_PK ,A.DS_CONTR_NUM ,A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK ,A.DS_ACCT_NUM ,A.TOC_CD ,A.AJE_ITEM_CD ,A.AJE_ITEM_DESC_TXT FROM NFAI0140_01 A WHERE A.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND A.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
